EVERYTHING YOU NEED.

Overview

Offering an array of leveraged KYC data from 3rd party vendors is not a new concept. However, making it simple and quick to activate, localized, intuitive and completely flexible to your businesses and its expansion needs is.

Our platform offers the largest selection of KYC verification tools in the industry for you to modernise your exisiting risk and compliance processes or utilise our complete end-to-end solution. Best part, activating any tool or data provider is done in real-time or within 5 days.

We'll make you
this confident.

Designed for enterprise volume. Our leveraged KYC data services are layered with innovative monitoring and analytics, comprehensive rules configuration, data management, global compliance processes and more.

We have everything you need to stay agile and optimally protected against illicit activity to capitilise on our digital transactional world.

FULL OF FEATURES

Our Product

KYC Made Easy
Leveraging the worlds leading verification technology, third party identity and fraud data vendors to create the largest selection of KYC tools in the industry, available via one simple API. Work with our Data Scientists to simply select and enable whatever you need to ensure optimal performance. It's that easy.
Global Compliance
We offer compliance driven KYC verifications from sanction screening to global watchlists coupled with a myriad of industry-specific use case regulatory requirement expertise, reporting, and automated features, removing the complexities of compliance to bring peace-of-mind, regardless of where your business transacts.
Vendor On-Demand
Whether you are entering a new market and require additional data services for localised KYC and compliance management or you want to modernise your exisiting processes with a new leading-edge verification technology, we have you covered. Integrate whatever you need, when you need it in real-time or within a 5-day activation.
Advanced Monitoring
Millions of transactions? Multiple sub-merchants? No problem. From real-time screen feeds, integrated analytics, one-click reports, multi-layered customised KPI dashboards and notification alerts you'll have everything you need to review your traffic and improve reaction times streamlining your operations, no matter your volume output.
Fraud Mitigation
A powerful risk rules engine built with hundreds of multi-layered parameters and automated system routing responses, coupled with machine learning, account profiling, and association logic, customised blacklisting and more, you will have all the tools you need to minimise your exposure and stop fraud in its tracks.
Data Scientists
Our personalised Data Scientists will not only work with you to ensure required verifications and system features are integrated for the best protection, transactional performance and compliance specific to your business, but are available 24/7 and on-demand, allowing instant expansion into new markets with no filled dev. queues ever.

Implementing new technology and solutions for customer identification and profiling is no longer a barrier for your business.

With instant access to an advanced network of innovative verification technology, you can modernise your business in minutes and maximise the benefits leading-edge KYC technology offers.

From customer profiling with biometrics to predictive behaviour modeling, which can lead to converting false positives and implementing predictive marketing for instant revenue growth and customer retention.

Increase Customer Value

Advanced customer verification at the point of registration, and each transaction allows for data-rich profiling to reduce friction and improve conversions.

Market Growth Confidence

Scale With Ease

Stay Leading-edge

WHO WE ARE

About FourStop

With multiple years experience in the risk management and compliance industry we believe that even though fraud mitigation and localised regulatory requirements is a cumbersome, multi-layered, and costly process, businesses should be able to do so in an innovative and simplistic manner. With little to no pain point on their business and to monitise on its benefits. We designed and built 4Stop to do just that.

Servicing our digital transactional world our platform is innovative in its ability to leverage the largest selection of advanced leading-edge verification tools, layered with robust anti-fraud features, all from a single API. Businesses can tailor their required KYC, KYB, and AML toolsets with efficiency and ease. Allowing them to modernise and leverage today's technology to maximise their return and growth for their business.
